note:
Decent British guy, PhD chemist, semi-retired professional scientist, published hobby writer (mostly erotica), keen photographer.
Co-carer of a delightful dog and two beautiful horses. Pro-humanity, pro-rationalism, happily agnostic.
Very broad-minded, supportive of other's life choices, tastes, hopes and dreams.
Sure we learn more by being open to new things.
Unenthusiastic about all forms of political stupidity and extremism.
Despair of humanity growing up in time to save ourselves.
#nobridge
